context: Analyze this plank variation pose and identify comprehensive transition relationships. Plank Pose (Phalakasana) Straight body balance on hands and toes. Consider the Core strength, shoulder stability, full body integration. Analyze transitions that flow naturally from this pose and evaluate both immediate possibilities and progressive developments. Factor in modifications for different ability levels and the pose's role in creating balanced sequences.

practitioner.position: Straight body balance on hands and toes
practitioner.primaryFocus: Core strength, shoulder stability, full body integration

specificNeeds: Core strength, shoulder stability, full body integration
